modName: Irish Tavern Wench for St Pats day
summary: A retexture of the Tavern Wench outfit made for the St. Patricks day. nif altered to make metal look more gold. Was supposed to be more but internet and pc were down for long time. Hopefully will help you be in mood a bit.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Irish Tavern Wench for St. Pats day
Author: Lord Inquisitor
Version: 1.1
Date: 16/03/2011
Cateogry: Modders Resource
Link: None
Homepage: None


===============
Short Description:
===============
A retexture of the Tavern Wench outfit made for the St. Patricks day. nif altered to make metal look more gold. Was supposed to be more but internet and pc were down for long time. Hopefully will help you be in mood a bit.



Contents: 2 nif 3 DDS

===============
Description:
A retexture of the Wench outfit made for the St. Patricks day. Ment to be more but internet and pc were down for long time. Hopefully will help you be in mood a bit.

Contents:
wenchoutfitf_0.nif nif altered
wenchoutfitf_1.nif nif altered to increase metal effect.
WenchOutfit.dds
WenchOutfit_em.dds

===============
Update Details:
===============

N/A

===============
Requirements:
===============

The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim

===============
Install:
===============
Recommended path
1. Extract the files from the archive.
2.Copy files to
Meshes Paths should be:
\Data\meshes\clothes\wench\wenchoutfitf_0.nif
\Data\meshes\clothes\wench\wenchoutfitf_1.nif

Texture Paths should be:
\Data\textures\clothes\wench\WenchOutfit.dds
\Data\textures\clothes\wench\WenchOutfit_em.dds


===============
Hi-Res Tex pack users:
===============

Unclick the HighResTexturePack01.esp and HighResTexturePack01.esp from the launcher OR just add an X to the file type so HighResTexturePack01.esp becomes HighResTexturePack01.espX. This allows for replacer textures to work without being forcefully wiped out by the High Res Texture packs.
If it whines on loading its because it can't now override your textures.

change your "Skyrim.ini" to read this
[Archive]
sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa
sResourceArchiveList2=Skyrim - Voices.bsa, Skyrim - VoicesExtra.bsa

Skyrim.ini is found in C:\Users\Documents\My Games folder

===============
Un-Install:
===============

1. Delete the folders associated with the mod

===============
Compatibility:
===============

No compatiblity issues so far.

===============
Bugs/Issues:
===============

No known issues so far, please let me know if you find any.

===============
History:
===============
